title: How to Make Nutella Sugar Cookies

steps.headline: Follow the instructions on the Pillsbury Sugar Cookie mix package to create your dough.
Roll the dough into separate balls on parchment paper.
Cut each of the balls of dough in half.
steps.description: This makes room for the Nutella inside.

steps.headline: Take one or two tablespoons of nutella and slather it on one of the sides of the dough balls.
Press the other side on top.
steps.description: This squishes the nutella between the slabs of dough.

steps.headline: Mold the dough back into one circle.
Do the same with the other balls of dough.
Place the cookie dough on cookie sheets.
steps.description: Make sure you have sprayed the sheet with cooking spray.

steps.headline: Put the cookies in  the oven at 365 °F (185 °C), and bake for 25-30 minutes or until edges are golden brown.

text: Follow the instructions on the Pillsbury Sugar Cookie mix package to create your dough.  Roll the dough into separate balls on parchment paper.  Cut each of the balls of dough in half. This makes room for the Nutella inside. Take one or two tablespoons of nutella and slather it on one of the sides of the dough balls.  Press the other side on top. This squishes the nutella between the slabs of dough. Mold the dough back into one circle.  Do the same with the other balls of dough.  Place the cookie dough on cookie sheets. Make sure you have sprayed the sheet with cooking spray. Put the cookies in  the oven at 365 °F (185 °C), and bake for 25-30 minutes or until edges are golden brown.  Take out and enjoy!  Finished.
